extendedInfo.description: Aim for 10,000 steps a day--and count every one of them--with the Ready, Step, Go! mobile pedometer app by CareFirst. Remember to start your music BEFORE you begin counting your steps!Track your performance- Count the number of steps you take each day. Shoot for 10,000 a day!- Measure how many calories you burn while you are walking.- Keep track of the miles you walk and how long you've been walking.- Measure your progress with a daily breakdown of your steps.Share with friends- Post your progress to Facebook and challenge your friends to take more steps than you!- Create walking events in Facebook and invite your friends to walk with you.- See a complete list of who's attending your upcoming Ready, Step, Go! Facebook events.Note: Due to iOS limitations, Ready, Step, Go! cannot count your steps while you are listening to music, talking on the phone, or texting. Tip - start your music BEFORE you begin counting your steps, or re-open the app after sending a text to continue counting your steps.

reviews.title: Best FREE Pedometer App
reviews.comment: Great App!! (HTC EVO). Much more reliable than other pedometer apps out there.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I\'m Crying!
reviews.comment: When I fist downloaded this app I tried it out for about 15 minutes. It accurately counted my steps and I was very excited. But when I checked about a 30 minutes later, all of my progress was gone. As if I never walked a single step. SO DISAPPOINTING!
reviews.author: Shrita B

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Won\'t keep my LG Optimus V from sleeping, so it stops registering steps as soon as I tap the lock button. If I put it in my pocket without doing that, the screen gets bumped and messes it up - and it\'ll go to sleep on its own soon anyway. I expected better functioning from a major health insurance co. (Yeah, I know, what a stupid notion.) Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I use this app all the time and just love it.  One thing that I would like to see added is a timer function so that you could not only see distance and calories for each walk but also the number of minutes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple & Effective!
reviews.comment: Works like a charm...(HTC Thunderbolt). Love seeing the calories change as I go throughout the day.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Frustrating
reviews.comment: It is not accurate. Did not keep up with actual steps. Tried many times came out with same results.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great app
reviews.comment: I tried various pedometer apps and found this one to be better than the rest as it recorded every step i took.
reviews.author: Sreelakshmi Prabhakar

reviews.title: Screen lock
reviews.comment: When the screen locks it stops counting steps
reviews.author: Cynthia Cornett

reviews.title: It good but...
reviews.comment: I can\'t change miles to kms
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work when screen locks
reviews.comment: Needs to have this issue fixed.  Very accurate when screen unlocked
reviews.author: Nick Smith
